MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Crossley road. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.53PM. Our engineers have arrived on site are investigating reports of a generator failure.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.05PM on 5th February 2021
